name: Internal Affairs HD Remix
description:
Fully digital HD upgrade of the iconic peow series INTERNAL AFFAIRS from Pat Crotty. It's about an Onion who rises from an unpaid internship, to becoming the hero who we didn't ask for, that can topple the corrupt and exploitive workplace machine complex and AI/Psychopath End-Stage-Captitalism that has overtaken the cyberpunk world of ANGEL CITY, but like, it's also funny.

IADCC gives "Digital Comics" a completely new meaning, with fully interactable 3d books, a "gun" option, a director's commentary, and a soundtrack from Padlock. 

Includes:

Internal Affairs  HD Remix - Directors cut of the original comic, with fully redrawn and updated visuals. Also includes the original artwork, the director's commentary track, and a mono-color mode.

Internal Affairs 2 - Digital comic with original artwork and a commentary track. 

Internal Affairs 3 - Digital comic with original artwork, immersive reading environment,  scripted events, and a commentary track.
